data.meta_description: Provides a mailing address for requesting autographs and sending fan mail to Barry Van Dyke
data.text:
How to send your fan mail and autograph requests to Barry Van Dyke?:

If you want to request an autograph, follow the guidelines bellow. If you just want to mail a letter with the address above, and do not want anything back, then you can stop reading! If you live in USA send a properly stamped and self addressed envelope (minimum size 8.5" x 4") with your request letter and a photo. You can include a piece of cardboard to keep the photo from bending in shipping and also add "Do Not Bend" on the envelopes. Send your letter and wait. On average, there is going to be a 3+ month wait for a response. If you do not live in USA, you can purchase your american stamps here *For information on postage prices to receive a letter from USA click here.

Feedback received:

Barry Van Dyke Success - March 27th, 2023

I wrote to Mr. Van Dyke on 02/13/2023 and heard back on 03/27/2023 Barry Van Dyke 27800 Blythedale Road Agoura Hills, CA 91301-1824 USA http://surfmypictures.com/image/ba2413acf6391756/2rhgp.html http://surfmypictures.com/image/ba2413acf6391756/xfswx.html http://surfmypictures.com/image/ba2413acf6391756/7sy4n.html http://surfmypictures.com/image/ba2413acf6391756/7w6ty.html http://surfmypictures.com/image/ba2413acf6391756/igdd0.html Comment | View 1 comment(s) Actor Barry Van Dyke, success - February 6th, 2023

Sent LOR, SASE and 1 6x8 photo to Barry Van Dyke on 1/20/23 using address in database. Got back photo personalized and with character name as requested on 2/6/23 signed in fine black ink. Barry Van Dyke 27800 Blythedale Rd Agoura Hills, CA 91301-1824 USA http://surfmypictures.com/image/da0d4470c7bc8ac9/ggsyc.htmlrl Uploaded with http://surfmypictures.comsurfmypicturesrl Comment | View 1 comment(s) Barry Van Dyke Actor - May 13th, 2022

Barry Van Dyke (born July 31, 1951) is an American actor and son of actor and entertainer Dick Van Dyke, and nephew of Jerry Van Dyke. He has often worked with his father. He is best known to audiences as Lieutenant Detective Steve Sloan, a homicide detective and the son of Dr. Mark Sloan (played by Dick Van Dyke) on Diagnosis: Murder. In the show, the characters' relatives were frequently played by real-life family members. His other television work includes a starring role in Galactica 1980 as Lieutenant Dillon.. Sent him 2 photos on 21 Apr and got them back signed on 13 May. Mr Barry Van Dyke 27800 Blythedale Rd Agoura Hills, CA 91301-1824 Comment | View 1 comment(s)
